Dallas, visiting PhD student in computer science under the supervision of Prof. Lingming Zhang09/2010~07/2014,Â  Beihang University, Bachelor diploma of software engineeringResearch InterestsSoftware Fuzzing: Mainly focusing on Fuzzing Fundamental Software (such as compilers, operating systems, chip design systems, AI infrastructure)Intelligent Software Engineering: Mainly focusing on solving software engineering challenges (such as code generation, test generation, code review) with LLMs or deep learning technologyTrusted AI: Mainly focusing on improving AI security, fairness, robustness, and performance with adversarial attacks, data optimization, prompting engineering, and software engineering methodologySoftware Maintenance: Mainly focusing on bug localization and fixing, AIOps
